title: Safety App - Family Link
content:
Hello,
When I open the Safety app on my pixel 3a, it requests me to log-in with a Google Gsuit for education account, and won't login with my personal Google account.
My google account is supervised with Family Link.
Is there any way to log in with my Google account in the app?
Thanks a lot!

Image linked is what I have every time
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
